name: In re Nomination Petitions of Robert MELENDEZ, Candidate in the Democratic Primary for the 127th State Legislative District. Appeal of Robert Melendez
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petitions of Melendez

parties: In re Nomination Petitions of Robert MELENDEZ, Candidate in the Democratic Primary for the 127th State Legislative District. Appeal of Robert Melendez.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of April, 2014, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
90 A.3d 699
In re Nomination Petitions of Robert MELENDEZ, Candidate in the Democratic Primary for the 127th State Legislative District. Appeal of Robert Melendez.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 11, 2014.
Decided April 25, 2014.
